full_content.content:
Frequently Asked QuestionsWhat should I do if my water heater isn’t heating water?When your water heater isn’t heating, start by checking the circuit breakers. For electric water heaters, reset both breakers, as tripped breakers are a common cause. For gas heaters, check the gas supply valve and ensure that it's open. If the burner won't stay on, the burner assembly may be faulty or the flue may be blocked. Clear the flue vent outlet if it's blocked. If these simple fixes don’t work, it's best to contact Sears Home Services for professional appliance repairs.How can I prevent my water heater from getting the water too hot?If your water heater is heating water too hot, the thermostat setting may be too high. Check and adjust the thermostat to no higher than 130°F, or 120°F for households with children. If adjusting the thermostat doesn’t solve the problem, the thermostat itself or a malfunctioning heating element might need replacing. Sears Home Services can help with diagnosing and fixing the issue.What do I do if my water heater is leaking?When your water heater is leaking, begin by checking the water pipe fittings and tightening any loose connections. Also, inspect the pressure relief valve and drain valve for leaks, which may need replacing. In electric water heaters, a leaking heating element could be the cause. If you're unable to resolve the issue, contact Sears Home Services to fix the leak.Can I fix my water heater myself, or should I call a professional?While some minor issues like resetting a breaker or adjusting the thermostat can be addressed by homeowners, more complex problems such as faulty heating elements, gas supply issues, or a leaking tank often require professional attention.
Sears Home Services technicians are trained to diagnose and repair all kinds of water heater issues quickly and efficiently, ensuring the problem is fixed right the first time.Ready to schedule your service? Contact us today to book an appointment with our expert technicians.

FIVE STAR SERVICEView All ReviewsWith more than 1.3 Million 5 Star Reviews, you don't have to take our word for it.Great work!Martin very friendly, knowledgeable  and helpful. Very clean work, explaining every step of work performed on the water heater and making sure  it is working properly before leaving. Thank you Martin!!!Dora M, Temecula, CADecember 20, 2025Hot Water Tank excessively loud Clanging noiseEric was very kind, considerate, polite, and professional while expertly diagnosing my 40 gallon Kenmore Hot Water Tank! 
He clearly communicated to me the procedure about how to replace it. 
I am very grateful to Eric.Joseph H, Tempe, AZDecember 12, 2025Great TechnicianFriendly, gave clear description of what he was doing and what he was seeing, and quickly resolved the problem.Bernard R, Lansing, MIDecember 08, 2025Water heater repairEdwin did an excellent job.  It was the same day of my request.  Great work!Wendy A, Ventura, CADecember 03, 2025Water Heater Preventative CheckBowman was an exceptional knowledgeable, efficient, cordial technician.
It was a pleasure to have him service my water heater!
I am disappointed with the poor notification system when there will be a no show. I had two appointments on 10/23 and 10/24 which were no shows and were rescheduled to 10/28.  On 11/4, I had a no show which was reschedule to 12/2. Customers deserve appropriate notification. Is  overbooking a problem???Saukin C, Honolulu, HIDecember 02, 2025So happy!Great service! Great communication. I appreciate his help with this hot water heater issueMariah O, Minneapolis, MNNovember 17, 2025Water heater protective maintanance....Mr.cornel is very nice person...hardworking,job knowledge & very polite employee that you have....I am completely satisfied with the job he did at my home....Thank you Sears & Cornel...Gayesh G, Gurnee, ILNovember 05, 2025Ron is great, SHS not so muchRon quickly knew what was wrong with my water heater, how to fix it, and how not to break it more before he got the parts. He also helped navigate the abysmal SHS customer service. He found the part locally that they said they could not get and once I was able to trick their AI agent into letting me keep an appointment with him, he was able to install it. He'd obviously done this before, knew the tricks, and got things installed and cleaned out great. Thank you, Ron!Craig V, Roseville, CAOctober 28, 2025Great serviceGary is very friendly and even educated me about how to maintain water heater going forward. Highly recommended!Dui R, Sunnyvale, CAOctober 21, 2025Good Service.He's in time, accurate, professional, he is the best, thank you.Michael M, Des Plaines, ILOctober 10, 2025He came in and automatically new we needed a new water heatVery nice, respectful and knowledgeable of what he was there for do.Gale H, Uppr Marlboro, MDSeptember 25, 2025Water heater trouble shootGary knows his stuff very good...oh I yes I would very much prefer having Gary do the install I on the new water heater.. simply because the warranty shows I get a replacement under warrantyRoger B, Walnut Creek, CASeptember 17, 2025HelpfulRandy went the extra mile to help us today. He could have said, "Sorry, I can't fix that, you'll have to call somebody else," but he invested extra time finding out exactly who I should call and what warranty we had and what to say.Erin L, Fernandina Beach, FLSeptember 09, 2025WATER HEATER  NOISEPAUL  TOLD ME THAT THE PROBLEM WAS NOT THE WATER HEATER BUT the water pressure was to high that was causing all the noise!
 i will call a plumber.
     PAUL SOLVED THE PROBLEM
THANKSMichael D, Coraopolis, PAAugust 18, 2025Water heaterTechnician Duan H. Is great, he knew what part to order for our water heater. It came in a timely manner. He returned & got it up & running. Thank you Duan for a great job.
On the other hand speaking to your AI is the worst. Samantha really got to me where I finally hung up on her. You need to put live agents to speak to because all they do is go round and round & you don't get anywhere. I rate your AI a zero. This is only the truth! I'm sure there are more people who would agree.Carlos C, Pico Rivera, CAAugust 16, 2025Water heater technicianGreat!  Very knowledgeable and nice!  My water heater was serviced by a great technicianBarbara J, Baltimore, MDAugust 08, 2025Hot Water RepairThe repairman/ Tech was great. Came in and installed the new part satisfactorily. However it took 8 (20 days) rescheduled appointments for him to get here.   I won't be renewing my contract ...It appears you have more service calls than you have people.Walter S, Wichita, KSAugust 07, 2025Very knowledgeable and helpfulEnrique quickly diagnosed the problem. He did not have the replacement part but pulled strings to get my water heater fixed very quicklyCharles H, Pico Rivera, CAAugust 01, 2025

Glossary TermsWhat is Hard Water?Hard water is water that contains high levels of dissolved minerals, particularly calcium and magnesium. It contrasts with soft water, which has lower concentrations of these minerals.What is a Thermocouple?A thermocouple is a sensor used for measuring temperature, consisting of two different metal wires joined at one end, which generate a voltage proportional to temperature changes.What is a K-Type Thermocouple?A K-type thermocouple is a sensor used for temperature measurement, consisting of two dissimilar metal wires that generate a voltage proportional to temperature changes, widely recognized for its accuracy and wide temperature range.What is a Heat Pump Water Heater?A heat pump water heater is an energy-efficient appliance that uses electricity to move heat from the air or ground into water, rather than generating heat directly.
